main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Columbia, S.C. on July 2, 1958.
interesting points: The observation was made visually on the ground and involved military personnel., The object was described as round and white, with the appearance of a meteor., The object flickered 3 or 4 times before fading out., Meteorite showers were noted in the area at the time of the sighting., The sighting lasted approximately 5-8 seconds.
